author: Jack de Menezes, Jack de Menezes
title: Olympics: Japan and IOC agree to postpone Tokyo 2020 Games
description: Thirty-second Olympic Games have been postponed until 2021 due to the coronavirus pandemic
content:
The Tokyo 2020Olympics is to be postponed until next year due to the coronavirus pandemic.
A decision was taken by the International Olympic Committee in agreement with the Japanese Government and Tokyo 2020 organising committee to delay this summers Games u… [+1729 chars]
